ComicInfo.Summary:
The Assassins Guild has been hunting Deadpool and the people he cares about, but they messed with the wrong Merc!
IN THIS ISSUE - Deadpool and his pals take the fight to the guild and hit 'em where they live...LITERALLY.
I mean it! Deadpool and co. ATTACK THE ASSASSINS GUILD HEADQUARTERS...AND NOT EVERYBODY MAKES IT OUT ALIVE!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Reg | Regular Cover | Mark Bagley, John Dell & Val Staples | 1 | Var | Variant Cover | Dave Johnson | Missing |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-04 15:16:34. [CVDB679988]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Dave Johnson, John Dell, Mark Bagley, Val Staples
ComicInfo.Characters: Assassin, Bella Donna, Black Mamba, Boomerang, Crossbones, Deadpool, Death Adder (Scott), Harvester, K.I.A., Lord Deathstrike, Scorpia, Threnody, Weasel
